body.p:
Philada. Pa Feb 23/61.
His Excellency
B. Magoffin
Dr Sir

I hereby respectfully apply to your Excellency for the renewal of my appointment as Commissioner of Deeds which will expire on the 2d March 1861. I am a member of the bar, competent to perform its duties and believe my acts have been satisfactory to persons having business with your State -- I beg to refer to former recommendations which I suppose are on file in your State Department

Pennsylvania
Joshua Sperring
Comr. of Deeds
Philad
Issd Feby 27.th 1861
